name: Friendship Down
description:
On their mission of peace, the small crew of the interstellar spacecraft Friendship find themselves in peril at the hands of the [Singularity]: artificial lifeforms bent on galactic domination.

Plasma missiles have crippled the companions’ beloved vessel. They have no choice but to flee to an uninhabited planet. Only through their camaraderie will they be able to survive.

produced by Poltergiest
